entry.title: Init
entry.summary: The starting point. A simple website, ready to rip and run for adding documentation, notes, ideas and failures while making whatever it is that'll be made in this class.
entry.content:
This is the starting point. A simple website, ready to rip and run for adding documentation, notes, ideas and failures while making whatever it is that I'll end up making in PHYSCI 70, Introduction to Digital Fabrication.

FWIW, this site was created with the Pelican static site generator and the Papyrus.
